example.code:
PS C:\>Get-IAMAccessKey -UserName "Bob"
AccessKeyId CreateDate Status UserName ----------- ---------- ------ -------- AKIAIOSFODNN7EXAMPLE 12/3/2014 10:53:41 AM Active Bob AKIAI44QH8DHBEXAMPLE 6/6/2013 8:42:26 PM Inactive Bob
example.description: This command lists the access keys for the IAM user named Bob. Note that you cannot list the secret access keys for IAM users. If the secret access keys are lost, you must create new access keys with the New-IAMAccessKey cmdlet.
